arts.ttl: Days after Bove collapsed on same field, Fiorentina loses on penalties to Empoli in Italian Cup
arts.sum: With teammate Edoardo Bove watching from his hospital bed, Fiorentina was knocked out of the Italian Cup on penalties by Empoli on Wednesday. The 22-year-old has been awake and alert since Monday and had asked his teammates to play the cup match — as it was being considered whether to postpone.

arts.ttl: Coppa Italia | Fiorentina 2-2 Empoli (3-4 on penalties)
arts.sum: Empoli triumphed in a thrilling Coppa Italia Round of 16 match against Fiorentina, winning 4-3 on penalties after a dramatic 2-2 draw. The post Coppa Italia | Fiorentina 2-2 Empoli (3-4 on penalties) appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Fiorentina confirm Bove out of intensive care
arts.sum: Fiorentina midfielder Edoardo Bove is no longer in intensive care and his recovery is progressing, the general manager of the Italian Serie A club said on Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Fiorentina's Bove out of intensive care after collapse
arts.sum: Fiorentina midfielder Edoardo Bove is out of intensive care and is progressing in his recovery, the club's general manager says.
